Description: Discover, manage, and optimize all SaaS applications used across your organization with automated tracking and insights.

Submodules.App Discovery: Automatically detect all SaaS applications being used through SSO, browser extensions, and financial data.
Submodules.App Catalog: Browse and manage your complete inventory of discovered and approved applications.
Submodules.Usage Analytics: Track application usage patterns, active users, and engagement metrics.
Submodules.Duplicate App Detection: Identify redundant applications serving the same purpose for consolidation.
Submodules.Shadow IT Detection: Discover unauthorized SaaS applications being used without IT approval.

Description: Track, optimize, and manage software licenses to reduce costs and ensure compliance with vendor agreements.

Submodules.License Tracking: Monitor active licenses, expiration dates, and renewal schedules.
Submodules.License Optimization: Identify unused or underutilized licenses for reallocation or termination.
Submodules.Cost Analysis: Analyze spending patterns and identify opportunities for cost reduction.
Submodules.Renewal Management: Automated reminders and workflows for upcoming license renewals.
Submodules.Contract Management: Store and manage vendor contracts, terms, and compliance requirements.

Description: Automate user provisioning and deprovisioning across all applications during employee onboarding and offboarding.

Submodules.Onboarding Workflows: Create automated workflows to provision new employees with required applications.
Submodules.Offboarding Automation: Ensure complete access revocation when employees leave the organization.
Submodules.Role-Based Access: Define application access templates based on job roles and departments.
Submodules.Access Requests: Self-service portal for employees to request access to applications.
Submodules.Access Reviews: Periodic reviews to ensure users have appropriate access levels.

Description: Ensure SaaS application security, monitor risks, and maintain compliance with organizational policies.

Submodules.Security Scoring: Risk assessment scores for each application based on security practices.
Submodules.Compliance Tracking: Monitor compliance status for SOC 2, GDPR, HIPAA, and other frameworks.
Submodules.Data Sharing Analysis: Identify which applications have access to sensitive organizational data.
Submodules.Threat Detection: Alerts for suspicious activity or unauthorized access patterns.
Submodules.Policy Enforcement: Automated enforcement of security and usage policies.

Description: Centralize vendor relationships, negotiations, and performance tracking for all SaaS providers.

Submodules.Vendor Directory: Comprehensive database of all SaaS vendors with contact and contract information.
Submodules.Spend Analysis: Track spending by vendor with historical trends and forecasting.
Submodules.Negotiation Support: Benchmark data and insights to support contract negotiations.
Submodules.Vendor Risk Assessment: Evaluate vendor security, stability, and business continuity risks.
Submodules.SLA Monitoring: Track vendor performance against service level agreements.
